subject: Generate a JUnit output similar to ANT
msgSnippet: I need to just generate an HTML report for JUNIT testcases/output not using ANT. Is there any alternative tool to generate HTML reports for the pass and failed
messageBody:
I need to just generate an HTML report for JUNIT
testcases/output not using ANT. Is there any
alternative tool to generate HTML reports for the pass
and failed cases. Thanks in advance.

--SRK
